snippet: Ukraine accused Russia of sending weapons and ammunition into war-torn areas of eastern Ukraine under the guise of humanitarian aid after a column of 106 white trucks crossed the border from Russia on Sunday.
abstract: Ukraine accuses Russia of sending weapons and ammunition into war-torn areas of eastern Ukraine under guise of humanitarian aid after column of 106 white trucks crosses border from Russia.
lead_paragraph: Ukraine accused Russia of sending weapons and ammunition into war-torn areas of eastern Ukraine under the guise of humanitarian aid after a column of 106 white trucks crossed the border from Russia on Sunday.

headline.main: Ukraine: Russian Convoy Moves Across Border With Mystery Cargo
